elements.text: In the past, you cooked to relieve stress. Lately, making recipes and cleaning up seem like a hassle because you're more unsteady than usual. You wonder if you should spend less time in the kitchen because afterwards you feel more...

elements.name: Cooking Struggle_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
